com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.validation

Interface Diagnostic

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiagnosticImpl

    public interface Diagnostic
extends Serializable

    Stores an error, warning or informational message produced as part of WComponent validation. Each diagnostic will can be associated with particular user context and component.

    In the case of a cross-field error the component may not be able to be specified, and may be null.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    James Gifford

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR
      Indicates that the diagnostic is an "error message".
      static int INFO
      Indicates that the diagnostic is an "informational message".
      static int WARNING
      Indicates that the diagnostic is a "warning message".

    • Method Detail

      • getSeverity

        int getSeverity()
        Returns:
        an indicator of the severity of the problem.

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Retrieves the formatted error message.
        Returns:
        a format message describing the situation.

      • getContext

        UIContext getContext()
        The user context in which the Diagnostic was issued.
        Returns:
        the context in which the diagnostic occurred.

      • getComponent

        WComponent getComponent()
        The "field "in the Business Object that produced the diagnostic, if there is one. This may be null in the case of cross field validation diagnostics.
        Returns:
        the field associated with the diagnostic, or null.
